fields.label: Heading
fields.value: We Are Portland's Web and Shopify Team

fields.label: Subheading
fields.value: Your Daily is a Portland-based, digital agency for the rapidly scaling business.

fields.label: Body
fields.value: We build and grow omni-channel Shopify e-commerce and boutique web systems to maximize efficiency and drive revenue. We understand each business faces a unique set of challenges, and we work closely with your team to build an effective development and growth strategy

value.heading: Managed Services
value.info:
Need help managing your website? Find Shopify. Wordpress, or any other CMS more than you bargained for. Can't afford a full time employee to run your website. I offer full web services for a flat monthly rate.


What‚Äôs Included: 10-40 hours of development time per month, monthly analytics reports, UX/UI improvements, content updates, product updates, bug fixes, emergency development


How: I will create a custom theme from the ground up for the client and create all Pages, Products, etc. fully customized to the clients specification


Why: I will train you on anything you need included in the project build but it may be more work than you expect or working with the backend of your website is a little out of your wheelhouse. I will be able to make any updates for you quickly and all for a low flat rate.


Additional: Any custom dev hours over agreed amount will cost $80 per hour

value.heading: Brochure Site
value.info: Need a way to brand yourself? Need an online presence? I offer custom boutique websites for people who feel constrained by the options of Wix, Squarespace, or any other diy web builders.

value.heading: E-Commerce Site
value.info: Are you a brick and mortar store looking to expand online? Are the DIY options to sell your items not cutting it? I offer full fledged E-commerce sites and offer a truly unique shoppping experience for your website.

value.heading: E-commerce Theme
value.info:
What‚Äôs Included: Homepage, Collection Page, Product Page, Cart, About Us Page, Contact Us Page, Blog


How: I will work with the client to choose a theme as a base for the website we will use the customizer built into the theme for 90% of the development.


Why: I will connect the URL‚Äôs, walk through Shopify Admin with the client, Set Up shipping and order processing, and make tweaks to the theme to get what the client needs out of it.


Additional: Any additional feature dev hours outside of scope will cost $80 per hour

value.heading: Semi-Custom Shopify
value.info:
What‚Äôs Included:Homepage, Collection Page, Product Page, Cart, About Us Page, Contact Us Page, Blog, Custom Collection and Product Pages for special products, 5 additional pages of clients choosing, app integrations, subscriptions (optional)

How: I will work with the client to choose a theme as a base for the website we will use the customizer built into the theme for 50% of the development.

Why: I will connect the URL‚Äôs, walk through Shopify Admin with the client, Set Up shipping and order processing, and make tweaks to the theme to get what the client needs out of it.

Additional: Any custom dev hours over 80 will cost $80 per hour

value.heading: Fully Custom Shopify
value.info:
What‚Äôs Included: Homepage, Collection Page, Product Page, Cart, About Us Page, Contact Us Page, Blog, Custom Collection and Product Pages for special products, 5 additional pages of clients choosing, app integrations, subscriptions (optional)

How: I will create a custom theme from the ground up for the client and create all Pages, Products, etc. fully customized to the clients specification

Why: I will connect the URL‚Äôs, walk through Shopify Admin with the client, Set Up shipping and order processing, and make tweaks to the theme to get what the client needs out of it.

Additional: Any custom dev hours over 200 will cost $80 per hour

value.heading: Basic Brochure Site
value.info:
What‚Äôs Included: Homepage, About Us Page, Contact Us Page, Blog, Gallery/Lookbook, 1 Additional page of Clients choice

How: I will work with the client to choose a theme as a base for the website we will use the customizer built into the theme for 90% of the development.

Why: I will connect the URL‚Äôs, walk through CMS (TBD) with the client, and make tweaks to the theme to get what the client needs out of it.

Additional:Any custom dev hours over 20 will cost $80 per hour

value.heading: Advanced Brochure Site
value.info:
What‚Äôs Included: Homepage, About Us Page, Contact Us Page, Gallery/Lookbook, 3 Additional page of Clients choice

How: I will create a Custom Static Site for the client

Why: I will connect the URL‚Äôs, walk through CMS (TBD) with the client, and make the site to the clients exact specifications

Additional: Any custom dev hours over 100 will cost $80 per hour

<link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="/primo-yourdailystudio/assets/yds-fav.png"/>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.6.0/jquery.min.js"></script>
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com">
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Ubuntu:wght@300;400;500;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> 
<link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.11.2/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

below.raw:
<script>
  $( '.block' ).each(function() {
    var distance = $(this).offset().top;    
    var block = $(this);
    
    function fadeUp() {
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.2 ) {
          block.find('.heading').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('.card').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('.feature-title').addClass('is-visible');
      }    
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.3 ) {
          block.find('.subheading').addClass('is-visible');
      }
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.4 ) {
          block.find('.body').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('.subfeature').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('li').each(function(i){
            setTimeout(function(){
              $('.mosaic').eq(i).addClass('pop-up');
            }, 400 * i);
          });        
      }      
    }
    
    $(window).scroll(function() {
      fadeUp();    
    });

    $( document ).ready(function() {  
        fadeUp();
    });      
  });

  $('.contact').click(function() {
    console.log('test');
    var target = $('#contact');
    $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: target.offset().top - ($(window).height() / 3)}, 500);
  });  
</script>
below.final:
<script>
  $( '.block' ).each(function() {
    var distance = $(this).offset().top;    
    var block = $(this);
    
    function fadeUp() {
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.2 ) {
          block.find('.heading').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('.card').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('.feature-title').addClass('is-visible');
      }    
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.3 ) {
          block.find('.subheading').addClass('is-visible');
      }
      if ( $(window).scrollTop() >= distance - $(window).height() / 1.4 ) {
          block.find('.body').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('.subfeature').addClass('is-visible');
          block.find('li').each(function(i){
            setTimeout(function(){
              $('.mosaic').eq(i).addClass('pop-up');
            }, 400 * i);
          });        
      }      
    }
    
    $(window).scroll(function() {
      fadeUp();    
    });

    $( document ).ready(function() {  
        fadeUp();
    });      
  });

  $('.contact').click(function() {
    console.log('test');
    var target = $('#contact');
    $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: target.offset().top - ($(window).height() / 3)}, 500);
  });  
</script>
